transcript: I'll never forgive you. I did you wait so long all this time I've sat around wondering if I was crazy for thinking of you

segments.text: I'll never forgive you. I did you wait so long all this time I've sat around wondering if I was crazy for thinking of you

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I'll never forgive you.  Why did you wait so long?  All this time I've sat around wondering if I was crazy for thinking of you.
